home.title: Hello world!
home.body: This site should be now in English, you should be able to read this text, if you understand English.

technology-stack.title: Frameworks and libraries
technology-stack.body: This site was created using Next.js. For styling I used TailwindCSS..
technology-stack.i18nParagraph: For internationalization, I've used template https://github.com/lauriahlfors/nextjs14-i18n.git, as I could not get Next.js library working from scratch.
